languages.text: The Bladedancer's second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g} allows the Bladedancer to jump a short distance and attack all the enemies around the landing spot. This ability can be used many times per round, gaining charges every time the reaper slays an enemy, providing the reaper with great mobility and a way to chain kills. The Bladedancer's heroic act is a deadly dance of jumps and attacks, in which the Bladedancer jumps towards the target using {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, then attacks that target with a sword, and then repeats that multiple times against random targets in the vicinity. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills} Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}. Blade Dancers can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassins{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioners{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}Archmilitants{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Bladedancer's second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g} allows the Bladedancer to jump a short distance and attack all the enemies around the landing spot. This ability can be used many times per round, gaining charges every time the reaper slays an enemy, providing the reaper with great mobility and a way to chain kills. The Bladedancer's heroic act is a deadly dance of jumps and attacks, in which the Bladedancer jumps towards the target using {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, then attacks that target with a sword, and then repeats that multiple times against random targets in the vicinity. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills} Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}. Blade Dancers can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassins{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioners{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}Archmilitants{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g}.

languages.text: The second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, allows the Bladedancer to jump a short distance and, upon landing, deal damage to all adjacent enemies. This ability can be used multiple times per turn, but each use requires a charge to be spent. These charges are gained through killing enemies. {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g} significantly improves the Bladedancer's mobility and grants them the ability to perform a quick series of kills. The Bladedancer's heroic act is a deadly sequence of jumps and strikes. The Bladedancer jumps toward the target using {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, then attacks that target with a sword, and finally repeats that combination multiple times against random targets within range. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}. Bladedancers can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}Arch-Militants{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassins{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioners{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g}.
languages.original_text: Вторая ключевая {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Смерть свыше{/g} позволяет танцору смерти прыгнуть на небольшое расстояние и после приземления нанести урон всем противникам на соседних клетках. Эту способность можно использовать сколько угодно раз за ход, но для каждого применения требуется заряд. Заряды можно получать за убийства противников. {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Смерть свыше{/g} значительно улучшает мобильность танцора смерти и предоставляет ему возможность совершать серии убийств. Его героический акт — это смертоносная комбинация прыжков и ударов. Танцор смерти прыгает к цели, как при выполнении {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Смерти свыше{/g}, а затем наносит удар мечом. Эта последовательность повторяется несколько раз против случайных целей в радиусе действия. Важные {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} танцора смерти: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Сила{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Навыки{/g} танцора смерти: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Атлетика{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Взрывотехника{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Наблюдательность{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Устойчивость{/g}. Танцоры смерти могут стать {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}архмилитантами{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасинами{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастерами-тактиками{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палачами{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, allows the Bladedancer to jump a short distance and, upon landing, deal damage to all adjacent enemies. This ability can be used multiple times per turn, but each use requires a charge to be spent. These charges are gained through killing enemies. {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g} significantly improves the Bladedancer's mobility and grants them the ability to make series of kills. The Bladedancer's heroic act is a deadly sequence of jumps and strikes. The Bladedancer jumps towards the target using {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, then attacks that target with a sword, and repeats that combination multiple times against random targets within the range. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}. Bladedancers can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassins{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioners{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}Arch-Militants{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g}.

Заряды можно получать за убийства противников. {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Смерть свыше{/g} значительно улучшает мобильность танцора смерти и предоставляет ему возможность совершать серии убийств. Танцоры смерти могут стать {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасинами{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палачами{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}архмилитантами{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастерами-тактиками{/g}.

languages.text: La deuxième {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} clé, {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Mort venue du ciel{/g}, permet au danselame de faire un saut de courte portée. À l'atterrissage, il inflige des dégâts aux ennemis adjacents. Cette capacité peut être utilisée plusieurs fois par tour, mais consomme une charge par utilisation. Ces charges sont gagnées en tuant des ennemis. {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Mort venue du ciel{/g} rend le danselame considérablement plus mobile et lui confère la capacité d'enchaîner rapidement les éliminations. L'acte héroïque du danselame est un véritable ballet meurtrier de sauts et de frappes. Il bondit vers une cible en utilisant {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Mort venue du ciel{/g}, enchaîne avec un coup d'épée, et recommence cette combinaison plusieurs fois de suite contre des cibles aléatoires à portée. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Vigilance{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétisme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Démolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Résistance aux intoxications{/g}. Les danselames peuvent devenir {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassins{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteurs{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}archimilitants{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maîtres tacticiens{/g}.
languages.original_text: The second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, allows the Bladedancer to jump a short distance and, upon landing, deal damage to all adjacent enemies. This ability can be used multiple times per turn, but each use requires a charge to be spent. These charges are gained through killing enemies. {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g} significantly improves the Bladedancer's mobility and grants them the ability to perform a quick series of kills. The Bladedancer's heroic act is a deadly sequence of jumps and strikes. The Bladedancer jumps toward the target using {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, then attacks that target with a sword, and finally repeats that combination multiple times against random targets within range. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}. Bladedancers can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}Arch-Militants{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassins{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioners{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La deuxième {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} clé, {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Mort venue du ciel{/g}, permet au danselame de faire un saut de courte portée. À l'atterrissage, il inflige des dégâts aux ennemis adjacents. Cette capacité peut être utilisée plusieurs fois par tour, mais consomme une charge par utilisation. Ces charges sont gagnées en tuant des ennemis. {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Mort venue du ciel{/g} rend le danselame considérablement plus mobile et lui confère la capacité d'enchaîner rapidement les éliminations. L'acte héroïque du danselame est un véritable ballet meurtrier de sauts et de frappes. Il bondit vers une cible en utilisant {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Mort venue du ciel{/g}, enchaîne avec un coup d'épée, et recommence cette combinaison plusieurs fois de suite contre des cibles aléatoires à portée. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Vigilance{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétisme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Démolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Résistance aux intoxications{/g}. Les danselames peuvent devenir {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassins{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteurs{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}archimilitants{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maîtres tacticiens{/g}.

La deuxième {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} clé, {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Mort venue du ciel{/g}, permet au danselame de faire un saut de courte portée. À l'atterrissage, il inflige des dégâts aux ennemis adjacents. Cette capacité peut être utilisée plusieurs fois par tour, mais consomme une charge par utilisation. Ces charges sont gagnées en tuant des ennemis. {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Mort venue du ciel{/g} rend le danselame considérablement plus mobile et lui confère la capacité d'enchaîner rapidement les éliminations. L'acte héroïque du danselame est un véritable ballet meurtrier de sauts et de frappes. Il bondit vers une cible en utilisant {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Mort venue du ciel{/g}, enchaîne avec un coup d'épée, et recommence cette combinaison plusieurs fois de suite contre des cibles aléatoires à portée. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Vigilance{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétisme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Démolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Ripaille{/g}. Les danselames peuvent devenir {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassins{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteurs{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}archimilitants{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maîtres tacticiens{/g}.

languages.text: Mit der zweiten Grundstein-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Tod von oben{/g}, kann ein Klingentänzer eine kurze Distanz springen und nach seiner Landung allen angrenzenden Gegnern Schaden zufügen. Diese Fähigkeit kann mehrmals pro Zug eingesetzt werden, aber jeder Einsatz kostet eine Ladung. Du erhältst diese Ladungen für die Neutralisierung von Gegnern. {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Tod von oben{/g} erhöht die Beweglichkeit des Klingentänzers deutlich und ermöglicht ihm eine schnelle Reihe von Kills. Die Heldentat des Klingentänzers ist eine tödliche Sequenz von Sprüngen und Schlägen. Der Klingentänzer springt mit {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Tod von oben{/g} auf das Ziel zu, attackiert es mit einem Schwert und wiederholt diese Kombination mehrere Male gegen zufällige Ziele in Reichweite. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fähigkeiten{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Achtsamkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Zerstörung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Zechen{/g}. Klingentänzer können {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassinen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}Erzmilitanten{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} sein.
languages.original_text: The second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, allows the Bladedancer to jump a short distance and, upon landing, deal damage to all adjacent enemies. This ability can be used multiple times per turn, but each use requires a charge to be spent. These charges are gained through killing enemies. {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g} significantly improves the Bladedancer's mobility and grants them the ability to perform a quick series of kills. The Bladedancer's heroic act is a deadly sequence of jumps and strikes. The Bladedancer jumps toward the target using {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, then attacks that target with a sword, and finally repeats that combination multiple times against random targets within range. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}. Bladedancers can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}Arch-Militants{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassins{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioners{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Mit der zweiten Grundstein-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Tod von oben{/g}, kann ein Klingentänzer eine kurze Distanz springen und nach seiner Landung allen angrenzenden Gegnern Schaden zufügen. Diese Fähigkeit kann mehrmals pro Zug eingesetzt werden, aber jeder Einsatz kostet eine Ladung. Du erhältst diese Ladungen für die Neutralisierung von Gegnern. {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Tod von oben{/g} erhöht die Beweglichkeit des Klingentänzers deutlich und ermöglicht ihm eine schnelle Reihe von Kills. Die Heldentat des Klingentänzers ist eine tödliche Sequenz von Sprüngen und Schlägen. Der Klingentänzer springt mit {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Tod von oben{/g} auf das Ziel zu, attackiert es mit einem Schwert und wiederholt diese Kombination mehrere Male gegen zufällige Ziele in Reichweite. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit {/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fähigkeiten{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Achtsamkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae {/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Zerstörung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Zechen{/g}. Klingentänzer können {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassinen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}Erzmilitanten{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker {/g} sein.

languages.text: La segunda {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} clave, {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Muerte desde el cielo{/g}, permite al hoja danzante saltar una distancia corta y, al aterrizar, infligir daño a todos los enemigos adyacentes. Esta capacidad puede usarse varias veces por turno, pero requiere gastar una carga por uso. Estas cargas se obtienen matando enemigos. {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Muerte desde el cielo{/g} mejora significativamente la movilidad del hoja danzante y le permite matar en rápida sucesión. El acto heroico del hoja danzante son una serie de saltos y golpes. El hoja danzante salta hacia el objetivo con {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Muerte desde el cielo{/g}, lo ataca con una espada y repite esta combinación en varias ocasiones contra enemigos aleatorios que se encuentren a su alcance. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Características{/g} clave: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidades{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Atención{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletismo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolición{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Juerga{/g}. Los hojas danzantes pueden convertirse en {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesinos{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutores{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}archimilitantes{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestros tácticos{/g}.
languages.original_text: The second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, allows the Bladedancer to jump a short distance and, upon landing, deal damage to all adjacent enemies. This ability can be used multiple times per turn, but each use requires a charge to be spent. These charges are gained through killing enemies. {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g} significantly improves the Bladedancer's mobility and grants them the ability to perform a quick series of kills. The Bladedancer's heroic act is a deadly sequence of jumps and strikes. The Bladedancer jumps toward the target using {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, then attacks that target with a sword, and finally repeats that combination multiple times against random targets within range. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}. Bladedancers can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}Arch-Militants{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassins{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioners{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La segunda {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} clave, {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Muerte desde el cielo{/g}, permite al hoja danzante saltar una distancia corta y, al aterrizar, infligir daño a todos los enemigos adyacentes. Esta capacidad puede usarse varias veces por turno, pero requiere gastar una carga por uso. Estas cargas se obtienen matando enemigos. {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Muerte desde el cielo{/g} mejora significativamente la movilidad del hoja danzante y le permite matar en rápida sucesión. El acto heroico del hoja danzante son una serie de saltos y golpes. El hoja danzante salta hacia el objetivo con {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Muerte desde el cielo{/g}, lo ataca con una espada y repite esta combinación en varias ocasiones contra enemigos aleatorios que se encuentren a su alcance. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Características{/g} clave: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Inteligencia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidades{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Atención{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletismo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolición{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Juerga{/g}. Los hojas danzantes pueden convertirse en {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesinos{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutores{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}archimilitantes{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestros tácticos{/g}.

languages.text: 2つ目の重要な{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}、{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}天からの死{/g}はブレードダンサーが短い距離をジャンプし、着地時に隣接するすべての敵にダメージを与える。このアビリティは1ターンに複数回使用できるが、使用するごとにチャージを消費する。チャージは敵を倒すことで得られる。{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}天からの死{/g}はブレードダンサーの機動力を大幅に向上させ、素早い連続キルを可能にする。 ブレードダンサーの英雄的行為は、ジャンプと攻撃を織り交ぜた致命的な一連の動きである。ブレードダンサーは{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}天からの死{/g}を使ってターゲットに向かってジャンプし、剣で敵を攻撃する。最後に射程内のランダムなターゲットに対して、この一連の動きを何度も繰り返す。 重要な{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}認識力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}身体能力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}解体{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}身体作用耐性{/g}。 ブレードダンサーは{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}アーク・ミリタント{/g}、または{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦術の達人{/g}になれる。
languages.original_text: The second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, allows the Bladedancer to jump a short distance and, upon landing, deal damage to all adjacent enemies. This ability can be used multiple times per turn, but each use requires a charge to be spent. These charges are gained through killing enemies. {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g} significantly improves the Bladedancer's mobility and grants them the ability to perform a quick series of kills. The Bladedancer's heroic act is a deadly sequence of jumps and strikes. The Bladedancer jumps toward the target using {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, then attacks that target with a sword, and finally repeats that combination multiple times against random targets within range. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}. Bladedancers can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}Arch-Militants{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassins{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioners{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 2つ目の重要な{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}、{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}天からの死{/g}はブレードダンサーが短い距離をジャンプし、着地時に隣接するすべての敵にダメージを与える。このアビリティは1ターンに複数回使用できるが、使用するごとにチャージを消費する。チャージは敵を倒すことで得られる。{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}天からの死{/g}はブレードダンサーの機動力を大幅に向上させ、素早い連続キルを可能にする。 ブレードダンサーの英雄的行為は、ジャンプと攻撃を織り交ぜた致命的な一連の動きである。ブレードダンサーは{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}天からの死{/g}を使ってターゲットに向かってジャンプし、剣で敵を攻撃する。最後に射程内のランダムなターゲットに対して、この一連の動きを何度も繰り返す。 重要な{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}知性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}認識力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}身体能力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}解体{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}身体作用耐性{/g}。 ブレードダンサーは{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}アーク・ミリタント{/g}、または{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦術の達人{/g}になれる。

languages.text: 刀锋舞者的第二个关键{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}为{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}死从天降{/g}，可以立刻越过一小段距离，落地时对周围所有邻近目标造成伤害。此能力可以在单个回合内多次使用，每次使用都会消耗1次使用次数。刀锋舞者可以通过击杀敌人补充使用次数。{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}死从天降{/g}可以大大提高刀锋舞者的机动能力，同时快速击杀敌人。 刀锋舞者的英雄壮举可以发动一系列跳跃与打击。刀锋舞者会对目标使用{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}死从天降{/g}，挥舞利刃攻击目标，之后不断重复跳跃、打击的过程，随机攻击范围内多名敌人。 关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}运动{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}警觉{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}饮酒{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}爆破{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}。 刀锋舞者可以晋级为{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}首席战士{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}。
languages.original_text: The second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, allows the Bladedancer to jump a short distance and, upon landing, deal damage to all adjacent enemies. This ability can be used multiple times per turn, but each use requires a charge to be spent. These charges are gained through killing enemies. {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g} significantly improves the Bladedancer's mobility and grants them the ability to perform a quick series of kills. The Bladedancer's heroic act is a deadly sequence of jumps and strikes. The Bladedancer jumps toward the target using {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, then attacks that target with a sword, and finally repeats that combination multiple times against random targets within range. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}. Bladedancers can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}Arch-Militants{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassins{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioners{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 刀锋舞者的第二个关键{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}为{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}死从天降{/g}，可以立刻越过一小段距离，落地时对周围所有邻近目标造成伤害。此能力可以在单个回合内多次使用，每次使用都会消耗1次使用次数。刀锋舞者可以通过击杀敌人补充使用次数。{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}死从天降{/g}可以大大提高刀锋舞者的机动能力，同时快速击杀敌人。 刀锋舞者的英雄壮举可以发动一系列跳跃与打击。刀锋舞者会对目标使用{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}死从天降{/g}，挥舞利刃攻击目标，之后不断重复跳跃、打击的过程，随机攻击范围内多名敌人。 关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}智力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}警觉{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}运动{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}爆破{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}饮酒{/g}。 刀锋舞者可以晋级为{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}首席战士{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}。

languages.text: İkinci kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} olan {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Tepeden Yağan Ölüm{/g}'de ise Kılıç Dansçısı, kısa bir mesafe sıçrar ve yere indiği anda bitişikteki tüm düşmanlara hasar verir. Bu kabiliyet, bir tur içinde birden çok kez kullanılabilir ancak her biri bir kullanım hakkı harcar. Bu kullanım hakları, düşman öldürerek kazanılır. {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Tepeden Yağan Ölüm{/g}, Kılıç Dansçısı'nın hareket kabiliyetini önemli ölçüde artırır ve düşmanı hızlı ve seri şekilde öldürebilmesini sağlar. Kılıç Dansçısı'nın kahramanca eylemi, ölümcül bir sıçrama ve atak dizisidir. Kılıç Dansçısı, {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Tepeden Yağan Ölüm{/g} kabiliyetini kullanarak hedefe doğru sıçrayıp ona kılıçla saldırır. Hemen ardından bu kombinasyonu menzil içindeki rastgele hedeflere karşı birkaç kez tekrarlar. Kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikler{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Yetenekler{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Farkındalık{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Sıhhiye{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletizm{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Tahribat{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Tiryakilik{/g}. Kılıç Dansçıları; {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Suikastçı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Cellat{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}Başmilitan{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Usta Taktisyen{/g}'e dönüşebilirler.
languages.original_text: The second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, allows the Bladedancer to jump a short distance and, upon landing, deal damage to all adjacent enemies. This ability can be used multiple times per turn, but each use requires a charge to be spent. These charges are gained through killing enemies. {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g} significantly improves the Bladedancer's mobility and grants them the ability to perform a quick series of kills. The Bladedancer's heroic act is a deadly sequence of jumps and strikes. The Bladedancer jumps toward the target using {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, then attacks that target with a sword, and finally repeats that combination multiple times against random targets within range. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}. Bladedancers can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}Arch-Militants{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassins{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioners{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g}.
